```{r}
ini <- Sys.time()
dados <- read.csv(unz('.../dados/flights.csv.zip', "flights.csv"))
fim <- Sys.time()
fim - ini
```

```{r}
library(readr)
ini <- Sys.time()
dados <- read_csv('.../dados/flights.csv.zip')
fim <- Sys.time()
fim - ini
```

```{python}
import time
import pandas as pd
ini = time.time()
dados = pd.read_csv(".../dados/flights.csv.zip", compression="zip", header=0, sep=",", low_memory=False)
fim = time.time()
fim - ini
```
